Package es.uma.ada.datastructures.graph

Interface WeightedGraph<V>

Type Parameters:
V - the type of the vertices
All Superinterfaces:
EdgeLabeledGraph<V,​java.lang.Double>, Graph<V>
All Known Implementing Classes:
SparseWeightedGraph
public interface WeightedGraph<V>
extends EdgeLabeledGraph<V,​java.lang.Double>
Interface for weighted (di)graphs
Author:
ccottap

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static double Infinity
    Used to mark non-existing edges (=infinite weight)

  • Field Details

    • Infinity

      static final double Infinity
      Used to mark non-existing edges (=infinite weight)
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • diEdgeWeight

      double diEdgeWeight​(V u, V v)
      Gets the weight of a directed edge. If the edge does not exist, a very large value is returned.
      Parameters:
      u - the origin of the directed edge
      v - the destination of the edge
      Returns:
      the weight of DiEdge from u to v
      See Also:
      Infinity
